attributes.action: start dealing with the major tax avoiders, who can afford to spend large sums on tax specialists in order to legally avoid paying billions in UK tax, whilst HMRC staff penalise the "soft target" of small traders and individuals who make innocent mistakes on tax returns, or whose return is late through no fault of their own.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK tax collection authorities already have a reputation for heavy handed tactics. Conveniently these heavy handed tactics do not extend to the vast untaxed wealth of international tax avoiders, but instead are only used against individuals and small businesses, who often cannot afford the time or legal representation to argue against the unfettered demands of overzealous tax inspectors, whose performance related pay is now linked to how much extra in taxes/fines they can squeeze out of us.
